responses.rationale: The segment describes the presence and circulation of the virus, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
Describes a safeguard ('Cooking... kills bacteria and viruses') without linking it to current calm or safety.
The segment describes an update to the story, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment describes an update to the story, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment describes a finding from testing, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
Describes response measures ('restricted the import', 'USDA is now testing') without linking to current calm or safety.
The segment describes a historical fatality rate, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment describes the cause of spread, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment describes confirmed cases based on data, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment describes confirmed cases, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment describes confirmed cases, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment describes agricultural production volume, not capabilities or preparedness measures related to the threat.
The segment describes agricultural production volume/status, not capabilities or preparedness measures related to the threat.
The segment describes the impact (culling), not capabilities or preparedness measures.
